original_text: And I will prepare destroyers against thee, every one with his weapons: and they shall cut down thy choice cedars, and cast them into the fire.
korean_text: 내가 너를 파멸할 자를 준비하리니 그들이 각기 손에 무기를 가지고 네 아름다운 백향목을 찍어 불에 던지리라

sentences.original_text: And I will prepare destroyers against thee
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너를 대적하여 파괴할 자들을 준비할 것이며

sentences.original_text: and they shall cut down thy choice cedars
and cast them into the fire
